about_the_game:
Join Our Discord Channel!

Experience the joy of running a supermarket! Set up shelves and fill them with products, earning profits through buying low and selling high. and then invest in larger store spaces, more diverse product categories, to attract more customers.

Arrange the shelves, display the goods, and once customers have made their purchases, tidy up the shelves and clean the floor. Feeling tired? Hire clerks to free your hands. However, please note that they are not volunteers; you'll need to pay them a considerable salary at the end of each business day.

Over 100 different products await your discovery. Each product has its designated shelf, so please ensure accurate placement to avoid any mix-ups.

Catch customers who litter or dirty the floor intentionally. Assign them to work as your clerks for a day, helping to reduce your working.

As time progresses, unlock new spaces and features, strategically expanding your store. Introduce additional equipment, enhance the aesthetics with decorations, and transform your store into the go-to destination for shoppers.

name: Supermarket Horizon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: "Supermarket Horizon" is now available, experience the most authentic supermarket operation from a first-person perspective, expand your store to accommodate more products, and use your wisdom to expand your business territory.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
